## Comparsion of OF CO2 emission between Australia and India


```{r}
countries <- data %>% 
  group_by(Country_Name) %>% 
    filter (Country_Name == "Australia" | Country_Name == "India" ) %>% 
  select(c("Country_Name","CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita")) %>% 
  summarise (CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita = sum(CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita, na.rm=TRUE)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita))
countries 
```
